    The transaction access mode. The value can be OFF (read/write; the default) or ON (read only).

    事务访问模式。该值可以是关（读/写；默认值）或开（只读）。

    The transaction access mode has three scopes: global, session, and next transaction. This three-scope implementation leads to some nonstandard access-mode assignment semantics, as described later.

    事务访问模式有三个作用域：全局、会话和下一个事务。这三个范围的实现导致了一些非标准的访问模式分配语义，如后文所述。

    To set the global transaction access mode at startup, use the --transaction-read-only server option.

    要在启动时设置全局事务访问模式，请使用--transaction read only server选项。

    At runtime, the access mode can be set directly using the SET statement to assign a value to the transaction_read_only system variable, or indirectly using the SET TRANSACTION statement. For example, use this SET statement to set the global value:

    在运行时，可以使用SET语句直接设置访问模式，将值赋给TRANSACTION U READ U ONLY系统变量，也可以使用SET TRANSACTION语句间接设置访问模式。例如，使用此SET语句设置全局值：

    SET GLOBAL transaction_read_only = ON;

    Setting the global transaction_read_only value sets the access mode for all subsequent sessions. Existing sessions are unaffected.

    设置全局事务只读值设置所有后续会话的访问模式。现有会话不受影响。

    To set the session or next-level transaction_read_only value, use the SET statement. For most session system variables, these statements are equivalent ways to set the value:

    要设置会话或下一级事务只读值，请使用SET语句。对于大多数会话系统变量，这些语句是设置值的等效方法：

    SET @@SESSION.var_name = value;
SET SESSION var_name = value;
SET var_name = value;
SET @@var_name = value;

    As mentioned previously, the transaction access mode has a next-transaction scope, in addition to the global and session scopes. To enable the next-transaction scope to be set, SET syntax for assigning session system variable values has nonstandard semantics for transaction_read_only,

    如前所述，除了全局和会话作用域之外，事务访问模式还有一个下一个事务作用域。若要设置下一个事务作用域，则用于分配会话系统变量值的set语法对于transaction_read_only具有非标准语义，

    • To set the session access mode, use any of these syntaxes:

      要设置会话访问模式，请使用以下任何语法：

      SET @@SESSION.transaction_read_only = value;
SET SESSION transaction_read_only = value;
SET transaction_read_only = value;

      For each of those syntaxes, these semantics apply:

      对于每个语法，这些语义都适用：

      • Sets the access mode for all subsequent transactions performed within the session.

        为会话中执行的所有后续事务设置访问模式。

      • Permitted within transactions, but does not affect the current ongoing transaction.

        在交易中允许，但不影响当前正在进行的交易。

      • If executed between transactions, overrides any preceding statement that sets the next-transaction access mode.

        如果在事务之间执行，则重写设置下一事务访问模式的任何前面的语句。

      • Corresponds to SET SESSION TRANSACTION {READ WRITE | READ ONLY} (with the SESSION keyword).

        对应于set session transaction{read write read only}（使用session关键字）。

    • To set the next-transaction access mode, use this syntax:

      要设置下一个事务访问模式，请使用以下语法：

      SET @@transaction_read_only = value;

      For that syntax, these semantics apply:

      对于该语法，这些语义适用于：

      • Sets the access mode only for the next single transaction performed within the session.

        仅为会话中执行的下一个事务设置访问模式。

      • Subsequent transactions revert to the session access mode.

        随后的事务将恢复到会话访问模式。

      • Not permitted within transactions.

        交易中不允许。

      • Corresponds to SET TRANSACTION {READ WRITE | READ ONLY} (without the SESSION keyword).

        对应于set transaction{read write read only}（不带session关键字）。

    For more information about SET TRANSACTION and its relationship to the transaction_read_only system variable, see Section 13.3.6, “SET TRANSACTION Syntax”.

    有关set transaction及其与transaction_read_only系统变量的关系的详细信息，请参见第13.3.6节“set transaction syntax”。

    Note

    transaction_read_only was added in MySQL 5.7.20 as an alias for tx_read_only, which is now deprecated and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Applications should be adjusted to use transaction_read_only in preference to tx_read_only.

    mysql 5.7.20中添加了transaction_read_only作为tx_read_only的别名，现在已弃用，并在mysql 8.0中删除。应用程序应调整为使用事务只读而不是TX只读。

  • tx_isolation

    TX U隔离

    Property Value
    Deprecated 5.7.20
    System Variable tx_isolation
    Scope Global, Session
    Dynamic Yes
    Type Enumeration
    Default Value REPEATABLE-READ
    Valid Values

    READ-UNCOMMITTED

    读未提交

    READ-COMMITTED

    已读-已提交

    REPEATABLE-READ

    可重复读取

    SERIALIZABLE

    可串行化

    The default transaction isolation level. Defaults to REPEATABLE-READ.

    默认事务隔离级别。默认为可重复读取。

    Note

    transaction_isolation was added in MySQL 5.7.20 as an alias for tx_isolation, which is now deprecated and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Applications should be adjusted to use transaction_isolation in preference to tx_isolation. See the description of transaction_isolation for details.

    在mysql 5.7.20中添加了transaction_isolation作为tx_isolation的别名，现在已弃用，并在mysql 8.0中删除。应用程序应调整为使用事务隔离而不是tx隔离。有关详细信息，请参阅事务隔离的说明。

  • tx_read_only

    Tx_只读

    Property Value
    Deprecated 5.7.20
    System Variable tx_read_only
    Scope Global, Session
    Dynamic Yes
    Type Boolean
    Default Value OFF

    The default transaction access mode. The value can be OFF (read/write, the default) or ON (read only).

    默认事务访问模式。该值可以是关（读/写，默认值）或开（只读）。

    Note

    transaction_read_only was added in MySQL 5.7.20 as an alias for tx_read_only, which is now deprecated and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Applications should be adjusted to use transaction_read_only in preference to tx_read_only. See the description of transaction_read_only for details.

    mysql 5.7.20中添加了transaction_read_only作为tx_read_only的别名，现在已弃用，并在mysql 8.0中删除。应用程序应调整为使用事务只读而不是TX只读。有关详细信息，请参阅“事务处理只读”的说明。

  • unique_checks

    独特的支票

    Property Value
    System Variable unique_checks
    Scope Global, Session
    Dynamic Yes
    Type Boolean
    Default Value ON

    If set to 1 (the default), uniqueness checks for secondary indexes in InnoDB tables are performed. If set to 0, storage engines are permitted to assume that duplicate keys are not present in input data. If you know for certain that your data does not contain uniqueness violations, you can set this to 0 to speed up large table imports to InnoDB.

    如果设置为1（默认值），将执行innodb表中辅助索引的唯一性检查。如果设置为0，则允许存储引擎假定输入数据中不存在重复密钥。如果您确定您的数据不包含唯一性冲突，那么可以将其设置为0，以加快大表导入到innodb的速度。

    Setting this variable to 0 does not require storage engines to ignore duplicate keys. An engine is still permitted to check for them and issue duplicate-key errors if it detects them.

    将此变量设置为0不需要存储引擎忽略重复键。引擎仍然可以检查它们，并在检测到它们时发出重复的密钥错误。

  • updatable_views_with_limit

    可更新的视图

    Property Value
    Command-Line Format --updatable-views-with-limit[={OFF|ON}]
    System Variable updatable_views_with_limit
    Scope Global, Session
    Dynamic Yes
    Type Boolean
    Default Value 1

    This variable controls whether updates to a view can be made when the view does not contain all columns of the primary key defined in the underlying table, if the update statement contains a LIMIT clause. (Such updates often are generated by GUI tools.) An update is an UPDATE or DELETE statement. Primary key here means a PRIMARY KEY, or a UNIQUE index in which no column can contain NULL.

    如果UPDATE语句包含LIMIT子句，则此变量控制在视图不包含基础表中定义的主键的所有列时是否可以对视图进行更新。（此类更新通常由gui工具生成。）更新是update或delete语句。这里的主键是指主键或唯一索引，其中任何列都不能包含空值。

    The variable can have two values:

    变量可以有两个值：

    • 1 or YES: Issue a warning only (not an error message). This is the default value.

      1或是：仅发出警告（而不是错误消息）。这是默认值。

    • 0 or NO: Prohibit the update.

      0或否：禁止更新。

  • validate_password_xxx

    验证密码

    The validate_password plugin implements a set of system variables having names of the form validate_password_xxx. These variables affect password testing by that plugin; see Section 6.4.3.2, “Password Validation Plugin Options and Variables”.

    validate_password插件实现了一组名为validate_password_xxx的系统变量。这些变量会影响该插件的密码测试；请参阅第6.4.3.2节“密码验证插件选项和变量”。

  • validate_user_plugins

    验证用户插件

    Property Value
    Command-Line Format --validate-user-plugins[={OFF|ON}]
    System Variable validate_user_plugins
    Scope Global
    Dynamic No
    Type Boolean
    Default Value ON

    If this variable is enabled (the default), the server checks each user account and produces a warning if conditions are found that would make the account unusable:

    如果启用此变量（默认设置），服务器将检查每个用户帐户，如果发现会使该帐户不可用的条件，则会生成警告：

    • The account requires an authentication plugin that is not loaded.

      帐户需要未加载的身份验证插件。

    • The account requires the sha256_password authentication plugin but the server was started with neither SSL nor RSA enabled as required by this plugin.

      帐户需要SHA256_密码身份验证插件，但服务器启动时未按此插件的要求启用SSL或RSA。

    Enabling validate_user_plugins slows down server initialization and FLUSH PRIVILEGES. If you do not require the additional checking, you can disable this variable at startup to avoid the performance decrement.

    启用validate_user_插件会减慢服务器初始化和刷新权限。如果不需要额外的检查，可以在启动时禁用此变量，以避免性能下降。

  • version

    版本

    The version number for the server. The value might also include a suffix indicating server build or configuration information. -log indicates that one or more of the general log, slow query log, or binary log are enabled. -debug indicates that the server was built with debugging support enabled.

    服务器的版本号。该值还可能包含一个后缀，指示服务器生成或配置信息。-日志指示已启用一个或多个常规日志、慢速查询日志或二进制日志。-调试指示服务器是在启用调试支持的情况下生成的。

  • version_comment

    版本注释

    Property Value
    System Variable version_comment
    Scope Global
    Dynamic No
    Type String

    The CMake configuration program has a COMPILATION_COMMENT option that permits a comment to be specified when building MySQL. This variable contains the value of that comment. See Section 2.9.7, “MySQL Source-Configuration Options”.

    cmake配置程序有一个compilation_comment选项，允许在构建mysql时指定一个注释。此变量包含该注释的值。参见第2.9.7节“MySQL源配置选项”。

  • version_compile_machine

    版本编译机

    Property Value
    System Variable version_compile_machine
    Scope Global
    Dynamic No
    Type String

    The type of the server binary.

    服务器二进制文件的类型。

  • version_compile_os

    版本编译操作系统

    Property Value
    System Variable version_compile_os
    Scope Global
    Dynamic No
    Type String

    The type of operating system on which MySQL was built.

    在其上生成MySQL的操作系统类型。

  • wait_timeout

    等待超时

    Property Value
    Command-Line Format --wait-timeout=#
    System Variable wait_timeout
    Scope Global, Session
    Dynamic Yes
    Type Integer
    Default Value 28800
    Minimum Value 1
    Maximum Value (Other) 31536000
    Maximum Value (Windows) 2147483

    The number of seconds the server waits for activity on a noninteractive connection before closing it.

    服务器在关闭非交互连接之前等待其活动的秒数。

    On thread startup, the session wait_timeout value is initialized from the global wait_timeout value or from the global interactive_timeout value, depending on the type of client (as defined by the CLIENT_INTERACTIVE connect option to mysql_real_connect()). See also interactive_timeout.

    在线程启动时，会话wait_timeout值根据客户端类型（由mysql_real_connect（）的client_interactive connect选项定义）从全局wait_timeout值或全局interactive_timeout值初始化。另请参见交互超时。

  • warning_count

    警告计数

    The number of errors, warnings, and notes that resulted from the last statement that generated messages. This variable is read only. See Section 13.7.5.40, “SHOW WARNINGS Syntax”.

    上次生成消息的语句所导致的错误、警告和注释的数目。此变量是只读的。见第13.7.5.40节“显示警告语法”。

5.1.8 Using System Variables

5.1.8.1 System Variable Privileges
5.1.8.2 Dynamic System Variables
5.1.8.3 Structured System Variables

The MySQL server maintains many system variables that configure its operation. Section 5.1.7, “Server System Variables”, describes the meaning of these variables. Each system variable has a default value. System variables can be set at server startup using options on the command line or in an option file. Most of them can be changed dynamically while the server is running by means of the SET statement, which enables you to modify operation of the server without having to stop and restart it. You can also use system variable values in expressions.

mysql服务器维护许多配置其操作的系统变量。第5.1.7节“服务器系统变量”描述了这些变量的含义。每个系统变量都有一个默认值。可以在服务器启动时使用命令行或选项文件中的选项设置系统变量。当服务器运行时，可以通过set语句动态地更改其中的大多数，这使您能够修改服务器的操作，而无需停止并重新启动它。也可以在表达式中使用系统变量值。

Many system variables are built in. System variables implemented by a server plugin are exposed when the plugin is installed and have names that begin with the plugin name. For example, the audit_log plugin implements a system variable named audit_log_policy.

许多系统变量是内置的。由服务器插件实现的系统变量在安装插件时公开，其名称以插件名称开头。例如，audit_log plugin实现一个名为audit_log_policy的系统变量。

There are two scopes in which system variables exist. Global variables affect the overall operation of the server. Session variables affect its operation for individual client connections. A given system variable can have both a global and a session value. Global and session system variables are related as follows:

存在两个范围，其中存在系统变量。全局变量影响服务器的整体操作。会话变量影响单个客户端连接的操作。给定的系统变量可以同时具有全局值和会话值。全局和会话系统变量关联如下：

  • When the server starts, it initializes each global variable to its default value. These defaults can be changed by options specified on the command line or in an option file. (See Section 4.2.2, “Specifying Program Options”.)

    当服务器启动时，它会将每个全局变量初始化为其默认值。可以通过在命令行或选项文件中指定的选项更改这些默认值。（见第4.2.2节，“指定程序选项”。）

  • The server also maintains a set of session variables for each client that connects. The client's session variables are initialized at connect time using the current values of the corresponding global variables. For example, a client's SQL mode is controlled by the session sql_mode value, which is initialized when the client connects to the value of the global sql_mode value.

    服务器还为每个连接的客户端维护一组会话变量。客户端的会话变量在连接时使用相应全局变量的当前值初始化。例如，客户机的sql模式由会话sql_mode值控制，该值在客户机连接到全局sql_mode值时初始化。

    For some system variables, the session value is not initialized from the corresponding global value; if so, that is indicated in the variable description.

    对于某些系统变量，会话值不是从相应的全局值初始化的；如果是，则在变量描述中指明。

System variable values can be set globally at server startup by using options on the command line or in an option file. At startup, the syntax for system variables is the same as for command options, so within variable names, dashes and underscores may be used interchangeably. For example, --general_log=ON and --general-log=ON are equivalent.

可以在服务器启动时使用命令行或选项文件中的选项全局设置系统变量值。在启动时，系统变量的语法与命令选项的语法相同，因此在变量名中，破折号和下划线可以互换使用。例如，--general_log=on和--general log=on是等价的。

When you use a startup option to set a variable that takes a numeric value, the value can be given with a suffix of K, M, or G (either uppercase or lowercase) to indicate a multiplier of 1024, 10242 or 10243; that is, units of kilobytes, megabytes, or gigabytes, respectively. Thus, the following command starts the server with an InnoDB log file size of 16 megabytes and a maximum packet size of one gigabyte:

当使用startup选项设置接受数值的变量时，可以给该值加上后缀k、m或g（大写或小写）来表示1024、10242或10243的乘数；即，分别是千字节、兆字节或千兆字节的单位。因此，下面的命令以一个16兆字节和最大字节大小为1千兆字节的NYNDB日志文件启动服务器：

mysqld --innodb-log-file-size=16M --max-allowed-packet=1G

Within an option file, those variables are set like this:

在选项文件中，这些变量的设置如下：

[mysqld]
innodb_log_file_size=16M
max_allowed_packet=1G

The lettercase of suffix letters does not matter; 16M and 16m are equivalent, as are 1G and 1g.

后缀字母的字母大小写无关紧要；16m和16m是等价的，1g和1g也是等价的。

To restrict the maximum value to which a system variable can be set at runtime with the SET statement, specify this maximum by using an option of the form --maximum-var_name=value at server startup. For example, to prevent the value of innodb_log_file_size from being increased to more than 32MB at runtime, use the option --maximum-innodb-log-file-size=32M.

为了限制系统变量在运行时可以用SET语句设置的最大值，通过在服务器启动时使用窗体最大值VARYNAMORY＝值指定此最大值。例如，为了防止在运行时NoYbByLogiFielyStand的值增加到超过32 MB，使用选项——最大的UNIB日志文件大小＝32米。

Many system variables are dynamic and can be changed at runtime by using the SET statement. For a list, see Section 5.1.8.2, “Dynamic System Variables”. To change a system variable with SET, refer to it by name, optionally preceded by a modifier. At runtime, system variable names must be written using underscores, not dashes. The following examples briefly illustrate this syntax:

许多系统变量是动态的，可以在运行时使用set语句进行更改。有关列表，请参见第5.1.8.2节“动态系统变量”。若要使用SET更改系统变量，请按名称引用该变量，可以选择在其前面加上修饰符。在运行时，必须使用下划线而不是破折号来写入系统变量名。以下示例简要说明此语法：

  • Set a global system variable:

    设置全局系统变量：

    SET GLOBAL max_connections = 1000;
SET @@GLOBAL.max_connections = 1000;

  • Set a session system variable:

    设置会话系统变量：

    SET SESSION sql_mode = 'TRADITIONAL';
SET @@SESSION.sql_mode = 'TRADITIONAL';
SET @@sql_mode = 'TRADITIONAL';

For complete details about SET syntax, see Section 13.7.4.1, “SET Syntax for Variable Assignment”. For a description of the privilege requirements for setting system variables, see Section 5.1.8.1, “System Variable Privileges”

有关集合语法的完整详细信息，请参见第13.7.4.1节“变量赋值的集合语法”。有关设置系统变量的权限要求的说明，请参阅第5.1.8.1节“系统变量权限”

Suffixes for specifying a value multiplier can be used when setting a variable at server startup, but not to set the value with SET at runtime. On the other hand, with SET you can assign a variable's value using an expression, which is not true when you set a variable at server startup. For example, the first of the following lines is legal at server startup, but the second is not:

在服务器启动时设置变量时，可以使用用于指定值乘数的后缀，但不能使用在运行时设置的后缀来设置值。另一方面，使用set可以使用表达式分配变量的值，这在服务器启动时设置变量时是不正确的。例如，以下第一行在服务器启动时是合法的，但第二行不合法：

shell> mysql --max_allowed_packet=16M
shell> mysql --max_allowed_packet=16*1024*1024

Conversely, the second of the following lines is legal at runtime, but the first is not:

相反，以下第二行在运行时是合法的，但第一行不合法：

mysql> SET GLOBAL max_allowed_packet=16M;
mysql> SET GLOBAL max_allowed_packet=16*1024*1024;
Note

Some system variables can be enabled with the SET statement by setting them to ON or 1, or disabled by setting them to OFF or 0. However, to set such a variable on the command line or in an option file, you must set it to 1 or 0; setting it to ON or OFF will not work. For example, on the command line, --delay_key_write=1 works but --delay_key_write=ON does not.

通过将某些系统变量设置为“开”或“1”，可以使用SET语句启用它们，也可以通过将它们设置为“关”或“0”禁用它们。但是，要在命令行或选项文件中设置此类变量，必须将其设置为1或0；将其设置为on或off将不起作用。例如，在命令行上，-delay_key_write=1可以工作，但--delay_key_write=on不能工作。

To display system variable names and values, use the SHOW VARIABLES statement:

要显示系统变量名称和值，请使用show variables语句：

mysql> SHOW VARIABLES;
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| Variable_name                   | Value                             |
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------------+
| auto_increment_increment        | 1                                 |
| auto_increment_offset           | 1                                 |
| automatic_sp_privileges         | ON                                |
| back_log                        | 50                                |
| basedir                         | /home/mysql/                      |
| binlog_cache_size               | 32768                             |
| bulk_insert_buffer_size         | 8388608                           |
| character_set_client            | utf8                              |
| character_set_connection        | utf8                              |
| character_set_database          | latin1                            |
| character_set_filesystem        | binary                            |
| character_set_results           | utf8                              |
| character_set_server            | latin1                            |
| character_set_system            | utf8                              |
| character_sets_dir              | /home/mysql/share/mysql/charsets/ |
| collation_connection            | utf8_general_ci                   |
| collation_database              | latin1_swedish_ci                 |
| collation_server                | latin1_swedish_ci                 |
...
| innodb_autoextend_increment     | 8                                 |
| innodb_buffer_pool_size         | 8388608                           |
| innodb_checksums                | ON                                |
| innodb_commit_concurrency       | 0                                 |
| innodb_concurrency_tickets      | 500                               |
| innodb_data_file_path           | ibdata1:10M:autoextend            |
| innodb_data_home_dir            |                                   |
...
| version                         | 5.7.18-log                        |
| version_comment                 | Source distribution               |
| version_compile_machine         | i686                              |
| version_compile_os              | suse-linux                        |
| wait_timeout                    | 28800                             |
+---------------------------------+-----------------------------------+

With a LIKE clause, the statement displays only those variables that match the pattern. To obtain a specific variable name, use a LIKE clause as shown:

使用LIKE子句，语句只显示与模式匹配的变量。要获取特定的变量名，请使用like子句，如下所示：

SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'max_join_size';
SHOW SESSION VARIABLES LIKE 'max_join_size';

To get a list of variables whose name match a pattern, use the % wildcard character in a LIKE clause:

要获取名称与模式匹配的变量列表，请在LIKE子句中使用%通配符：

SHOW VARIABLES LIKE '%size%';
SHOW GLOBAL VARIABLES LIKE '%size%';

Wildcard characters can be used in any position within the pattern to be matched. Strictly speaking, because _ is a wildcard that matches any single character, you should escape it as \_ to match it literally. In practice, this is rarely necessary.

通配符可用于要匹配的模式中的任何位置。严格地说，因为是一个与任何单个字符匹配的通配符，所以您应该将其转义为\，以逐字匹配它。实际上，这是很少必要的。

For SHOW VARIABLES, if you specify neither GLOBAL nor SESSION, MySQL returns SESSION values.

对于show变量，如果既不指定global也不指定session，mysql将返回session值。

The reason for requiring the GLOBAL keyword when setting GLOBAL-only variables but not when retrieving them is to prevent problems in the future:

在只设置全局变量而不检索变量时需要全局关键字的原因是为了防止将来出现问题：

  • Were a SESSION variable to be removed that has the same name as a GLOBAL variable, a client with privileges sufficient to modify global variables might accidentally change the GLOBAL variable rather than just the SESSION variable for its own session.

    如果要删除的会话变量与全局变量同名，则具有足够权限修改全局变量的客户端可能会意外更改全局变量，而不仅仅是更改其自身会话的会话变量。

  • Were a SESSION variable to be added with the same name as a GLOBAL variable, a client that intends to change the GLOBAL variable might find only its own SESSION variable changed.

    如果要添加与全局变量同名的会话变量，则打算更改全局变量的客户端可能只会发现其自己的会话变量已更改。

5.1.8.1 System Variable Privileges

A system variable can have a global value that affects server operation as a whole, a session value that affects only the current session, or both. To modify system variable runtime values, use the SET statement. See Section 13.7.4.1, “SET Syntax for Variable Assignment”. This section describes the privileges required to assign values to system variables at runtime.

系统变量可以具有影响整个服务器操作的全局值、仅影响当前会话的会话值或同时具有这两个值。要修改系统变量运行时值，请使用SET语句。见第13.7.4.1节“变量赋值的设置语法”。本节介绍在运行时为系统变量赋值所需的权限。

Setting a global system variable runtime value requires the SUPER privilege.

设置全局系统变量运行时值需要超级权限。

To set a session system variable runtime value, use the SET SESSION statement. In contrast to setting global runtime values, setting session runtime values normally requires no special privileges and can be done by any user to affect the current session. For some system variables, setting the session value may have effects outside the current session and thus is a restricted operation that can be done only by users who have the SUPER privilege. If a session system variable is restricted in this way, the variable description indicates that restriction. Examples include binlog_format and sql_log_bin. Setting the session value of these variables affects binary logging for the current session, but may also have wider implications for the integrity of server replication and backups.

要设置会话系统变量运行时值，请使用SET SESSION语句。与设置全局运行时值不同，设置会话运行时值通常不需要特殊权限，任何用户都可以执行此操作来影响当前会话。对于某些系统变量，设置会话值可能会在当前会话之外产生影响，因此是一个受限操作，只能由具有超级权限的用户执行。如果会话系统变量以这种方式受到限制，则变量说明指示该限制。例如bin log_格式和sql_log_bin。设置这些变量的会话值会影响当前会话的二进制日志记录，但也可能会对服务器复制和备份的完整性产生更广泛的影响。

5.1.8.2 Dynamic System Variables

Many server system variables are dynamic and can be set at runtime. See Section 13.7.4.1, “SET Syntax for Variable Assignment”. For a description of the privilege requirements for setting system variables, see Section 5.1.8.1, “System Variable Privileges”

许多服务器系统变量是动态的，可以在运行时设置。见第13.7.4.1节“变量赋值的设置语法”。有关设置系统变量的权限要求的说明，请参阅第5.1.8.1节“系统变量权限”

The following table lists all dynamic system variables applicable within mysqld.

下表列出了mysqld中适用的所有动态系统变量。

The table lists each variable's data type and scope. The last column indicates whether the scope for each variable is Global, Session, or both. Please see the corresponding item descriptions for details on setting and using the variables. Where appropriate, direct links to further information about the items are provided.

该表列出了每个变量的数据类型和范围。最后一列指示每个变量的作用域是全局的、会话的还是两者都是。有关设置和使用变量的详细信息，请参见相应的项目说明。在适当的情况下，将提供到有关这些项目的进一步信息的直接链接。

Variables that have a type of “string” take a string value. Variables that have a type of “numeric” take a numeric value. Variables that have a type of “boolean” can be set to 0, 1, ON or OFF. Variables that are marked as “enumeration” normally should be set to one of the available values for the variable, but can also be set to the number that corresponds to the desired enumeration value. For enumerated system variables, the first enumeration value corresponds to 0. This differs from the ENUM data type used for table columns, for which the first enumeration value corresponds to 1.

类型为“string”的变量采用字符串值。具有“numeric”类型的变量采用数值。具有“布尔”类型的变量可以设置为0、1、开或关。通常标记为“枚举”的变量应设置为变量的可用值之一，但也可以设置为与所需枚举值相对应的数字。对于枚举的系统变量，第一个枚举值对应于0。这与用于表列的枚举数据类型不同，表列的第一个枚举值对应于1。

Table 5.4 Dynamic System Variable Summary

表5.4动态系统变量汇总

version_tokens_session String Both
wait_timeout Integer Both

5.1.8.3 Structured System Variables

A structured variable differs from a regular system variable in two respects:

结构化变量与常规系统变量在两个方面不同：

  • Its value is a structure with components that specify server parameters considered to be closely related.

    它的值是一个包含组件的结构，这些组件指定被认为是密切相关的服务器参数。

  • There might be several instances of a given type of structured variable. Each one has a different name and refers to a different resource maintained by the server.

    给定类型的结构化变量可能有多个实例。每个资源都有一个不同的名称，并引用服务器维护的不同资源。

MySQL supports one structured variable type, which specifies parameters governing the operation of key caches. A key cache structured variable has these components:

mysql支持一种结构化变量类型，它指定控制键缓存操作的参数。密钥缓存结构化变量包含以下组件：

  • key_buffer_size

    密钥缓冲区大小

  • key_cache_block_size

    密钥缓存块大小

  • key_cache_division_limit

    密钥缓存分区限制

  • key_cache_age_threshold

    密钥缓存年龄阈值

This section describes the syntax for referring to structured variables. Key cache variables are used for syntax examples, but specific details about how key caches operate are found elsewhere, in Section 8.10.2, “The MyISAM Key Cache”.

本节描述引用结构化变量的语法。密钥缓存变量用于语法示例，但有关密钥缓存操作方式的特定详细信息，请参阅8.10.2节“MyISAM密钥缓存”。

To refer to a component of a structured variable instance, you can use a compound name in instance_name.component_name format. Examples:

要引用结构化变量实例的组件，可以使用instance_name.component_name格式的复合名称。示例：

hot_cache.key_buffer_size
hot_cache.key_cache_block_size
cold_cache.key_cache_block_size

For each structured system variable, an instance with the name of default is always predefined. If you refer to a component of a structured variable without any instance name, the default instance is used. Thus, default.key_buffer_size and key_buffer_size both refer to the same system variable.

对于每个结构化系统变量，都会预定义一个名为default的实例。如果引用的是没有任何实例名的结构化变量的组件，则使用默认实例。因此，default.key_buffer_size和key_buffer_size都引用同一个系统变量。

Structured variable instances and components follow these naming rules:

结构化变量实例和组件遵循以下命名规则：

  • For a given type of structured variable, each instance must have a name that is unique within variables of that type. However, instance names need not be unique across structured variable types. For example, each structured variable has an instance named default, so default is not unique across variable types.

    对于给定类型的结构化变量，每个实例的名称必须在该类型的变量中是唯一的。但是，实例名称在结构化变量类型中不必是唯一的。例如，每个结构化变量都有一个名为default的实例，因此default在变量类型中不唯一。

  • The names of the components of each structured variable type must be unique across all system variable names. If this were not true (that is, if two different types of structured variables could share component member names), it would not be clear which default structured variable to use for references to member names that are not qualified by an instance name.

    每个结构化变量类型的组件的名称在所有系统变量名称中必须是唯一的。如果这不是真的（也就是说，如果两种不同类型的结构化变量可以共享组件成员名），则不清楚要使用哪个默认结构化变量来引用不受实例名限制的成员名。

  • If a structured variable instance name is not legal as an unquoted identifier, refer to it as a quoted identifier using backticks. For example, hot-cache is not legal, but `hot-cache` is.

    如果结构化变量实例名作为非引号标识符不合法，请使用反勾号将其作为引号标识符引用。例如，热缓存是不合法的，但“热缓存”是合法的。

  • global, session, and local are not legal instance names. This avoids a conflict with notation such as @@GLOBAL.var_name for referring to nonstructured system variables.

    全局、会话和本地不是合法的实例名称。这避免了与诸如@@global.var_name之类的符号冲突，因为它引用了非结构化的系统变量。

Currently, the first two rules have no possibility of being violated because the only structured variable type is the one for key caches. These rules will assume greater significance if some other type of structured variable is created in the future.

目前，前两个规则不可能被违反，因为唯一的结构化变量类型是用于键缓存的类型。如果将来创建其他类型的结构化变量，这些规则将具有更大的意义。

With one exception, you can refer to structured variable components using compound names in any context where simple variable names can occur. For example, you can assign a value to a structured variable using a command-line option:

除了一个例外，您可以在任何可以出现简单变量名的上下文中使用复合名称引用结构化变量组件。例如，可以使用命令行选项为结构化变量赋值：

shell> mysqld --hot_cache.key_buffer_size=64K

In an option file, use this syntax:

在选项文件中，使用以下语法：

[mysqld]
hot_cache.key_buffer_size=64K

If you start the server with this option, it creates a key cache named hot_cache with a size of 64KB in addition to the default key cache that has a default size of 8MB.

如果使用此选项启动服务器，它将创建一个名为hot_cache的密钥缓存，其大小为64kb，另外还有默认大小为8mb的默认密钥缓存。

Suppose that you start the server as follows:

假设您按如下方式启动服务器：

shell> mysqld --key_buffer_size=256K \
         --extra_cache.key_buffer_size=128K \
         --extra_cache.key_cache_block_size=2048

In this case, the server sets the size of the default key cache to 256KB. (You could also have written --default.key_buffer_size=256K.) In addition, the server creates a second key cache named extra_cache that has a size of 128KB, with the size of block buffers for caching table index blocks set to 2048 bytes.

在这种情况下，服务器将默认密钥缓存的大小设置为256KB。（您还可以编写——default.key_buffer_size=256k。）此外，服务器创建了第二个名为extra_cache的密钥缓存，其大小为128KB，用于缓存表索引块的块缓冲区大小设置为2048字节。

The following example starts the server with three different key caches having sizes in a 3:1:1 ratio:

以下示例使用三个大小为3:1:1的不同密钥缓存启动服务器：

shell> mysqld --key_buffer_size=6M \
         --hot_cache.key_buffer_size=2M \
         --cold_cache.key_buffer_size=2M

Structured variable values may be set and retrieved at runtime as well. For example, to set a key cache named hot_cache to a size of 10MB, use either of these statements:

结构化变量值也可以在运行时设置和检索。例如，要将名为hot_cache的密钥缓存设置为10MB，请使用以下任一语句：

mysql> SET GLOBAL hot_cache.key_buffer_size = 10*1024*1024;
mysql> SET @@GLOBAL.hot_cache.key_buffer_size = 10*1024*1024;

To retrieve the cache size, do this:

要检索缓存大小，请执行以下操作：

mysql> SELECT @@GLOBAL.hot_cache.key_buffer_size;

However, the following statement does not work. The variable is not interpreted as a compound name, but as a simple string for a LIKE pattern-matching operation:

但是，以下语句不起作用。变量不是解释为复合名称，而是类似模式匹配操作的简单字符串：

mysql> SHOW GLOBAL VARIABLES LIKE 'hot_cache.key_buffer_size';

This is the exception to being able to use structured variable names anywhere a simple variable name may occur.

在任何可能出现简单变量名的地方都可以使用结构化变量名，这是一个例外。

5.1.9 Server Status Variables

The MySQL server maintains many status variables that provide information about its operation. You can view these variables and their values by using the SHOW [GLOBAL | SESSION] STATUS statement (see Section 13.7.5.35, “SHOW STATUS Syntax”). The optional GLOBAL keyword aggregates the values over all connections, and SESSION shows the values for the current connection.

mysql服务器维护许多状态变量，这些变量提供有关其操作的信息。您可以使用show[global session]status语句查看这些变量及其值（请参阅13.7.5.35节，“show status syntax”）。可选的global关键字聚合所有连接上的值，session显示当前连接的值。

mysql> SHOW GLOBAL STATUS;
+-----------------------------------+------------+
| Variable_name                     | Value      |
+-----------------------------------+------------+
| Aborted_clients                   | 0          |
| Aborted_connects                  | 0          |
| Bytes_received                    | 155372598  |
| Bytes_sent                        | 1176560426 |
...
| Connections                       | 30023      |
| Created_tmp_disk_tables           | 0          |
| Created_tmp_files                 | 3          |
| Created_tmp_tables                | 2          |
...
| Threads_created                   | 217        |
| Threads_running                   | 88         |
| Uptime                            | 1389872    |
+-----------------------------------+------------+

Many status variables are reset to 0 by the FLUSH STATUS statement.

许多状态变量被flush status语句重置为0。

This section provides a description of each status variable. For a status variable summary, see Section 5.1.5, “Server Status Variable Reference”.

本节提供每个状态变量的说明。有关状态变量摘要，请参阅第5.1.5节“服务器状态变量参考”。

The status variables have the meanings shown in the following list. For meanings of status variables specific to NDB Cluster, see Section 21.3.3.9.3, “NDB Cluster Status Variables”.

状态变量的含义如下表所示。有关特定于ndb集群的状态变量的含义，请参见第21.3.3.9.3节“ndb集群状态变量”。

  • Aborted_clients

    中止的客户机

    The number of connections that were aborted because the client died without closing the connection properly. See Section B.4.2.10, “Communication Errors and Aborted Connections”.

    由于客户端未正确关闭连接而终止的连接数。参见第B.4.2.10节“通信错误和中断的连接”。

  • Aborted_connects

    中断的连接

    The number of failed attempts to connect to the MySQL server. See Section B.4.2.10, “Communication Errors and Aborted Connections”.

    尝试连接到MySQL服务器失败的次数。参见第B.4.2.10节“通信错误和中断的连接”。

    For additional connection-related information, check the Connection_errors_xxx status variables and the host_cache table.

    有关其他连接相关信息，请检查connection_errors_xxx status变量和host_cache表。

    As of MySQL 5.7.3, Aborted_connects is not visible in the embedded server because for that server it is not updated and is not meaningful.

    从mysql 5.7.3开始，中断的连接在嵌入式服务器中不可见，因为对于该服务器，它没有更新，也没有意义。

  • Binlog_cache_disk_use

    缓存磁盘使用

    The number of transactions that used the temporary binary log cache but that exceeded the value of binlog_cache_size and used a temporary file to store statements from the transaction.

    使用临时二进制日志缓存但超过binlog_cache_size值并使用临时文件存储事务语句的事务数。

    The number of nontransactional statements that caused the binary log transaction cache to be written to disk is tracked separately in the Binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use status variable.

    导致二进制日志事务缓存写入磁盘的非事务语句的数量在binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use status变量中单独跟踪。

  • Binlog_cache_use

    缓存使用

    The number of transactions that used the binary log cache.

    使用二进制日志缓存的事务数。

  • Binlog_stmt_cache_disk_use

    缓存磁盘使用

    The number of nontransaction statements that used the binary log statement cache but that exceeded the value of binlog_stmt_cache_size and used a temporary file to store those statements.

    使用二进制日志语句缓存但超过binlog stmt缓存大小值并使用临时文件存储这些语句的非事务语句数。

  • Binlog_stmt_cache_use

    缓存使用

    The number of nontransactional statements that used the binary log statement cache.

    使用二进制日志语句缓存的非事务语句数。

  • Bytes_received

    接收的字节数

    The number of bytes received from all clients.

    从所有客户端接收的字节数。

  • Bytes_sent

    发送的字节数

    The number of bytes sent to all clients.

    发送到所有客户端的字节数。

  • Com_xxx

    XXX公司

    The Com_xxx statement counter variables indicate the number of times each xxx statement has been executed. There is one status variable for each type of statement. For example, Com_delete and Com_update count DELETE and UPDATE statements, respectively. Com_delete_multi and Com_update_multi are similar but apply to DELETE and UPDATE statements that use multiple-table syntax.

    com_xxx语句计数器变量表示每个xxx语句执行的次数。每种类型的语句都有一个状态变量。例如，com_delete和com_update count delete和update语句。com_delete_multi和com_update_multi类似，但适用于使用多表语法的delete和update语句。

    If a query result is returned from query cache, the server increments the Qcache_hits status variable, not Com_select. See Section 8.10.3.4, “Query Cache Status and Maintenance”.

    如果查询结果是从查询缓存返回的，则服务器将递增qcache_hits状态变量，而不是com_select。参见第8.10.3.4节“查询缓存状态和维护”。

    All Com_stmt_xxx variables are increased even if a prepared statement argument is unknown or an error occurred during execution. In other words, their values correspond to the number of requests issued, not to the number of requests successfully completed. For example, because status variables are initialized for each server startup and do not persist across restarts, the Com_shutdown variable that tracks SHUTDOWN statements normally has a value of zero, but can be nonzero if SHUTDOWN statements were executed but failed.

    即使准备好的语句参数未知或在执行过程中发生错误，所有com_stmt_xxx变量也会增加。换句话说，它们的值对应于发出的请求数，而不是成功完成的请求数。例如，由于状态变量是为每次服务器启动初始化的，并且不会在重新启动时持续存在，因此跟踪shutdown语句的com_shutdown变量的值通常为零，但如果shutdown语句已执行但失败，则可以为非零。

    The Com_stmt_xxx status variables are as follows:

    com_stmt_xxx状态变量如下：

    • Com_stmt_prepare

      准备

    • Com_stmt_execute

      执行命令

    • Com_stmt_fetch

      Com_stmt_获取

    • Com_stmt_send_long_data

      发送长数据

    • Com_stmt_reset

      Com_stmt_重置

    • Com_stmt_close

      交易结束

    Those variables stand for prepared statement commands. Their names refer to the COM_xxx command set used in the network layer. In other words, their values increase whenever prepared statement API calls such as mysql_stmt_prepare(), mysql_stmt_execute(), and so forth are executed. However, Com_stmt_prepare, Com_stmt_execute and Com_stmt_close also increase for PREPARE, EXECUTE, or DEALLOCATE PREPARE, respectively. Additionally, the values of the older statement counter variables Com_prepare_sql, Com_execute_sql, and Com_dealloc_sql increase for the PREPARE, EXECUTE, and DEALLOCATE PREPARE statements. Com_stmt_fetch stands for the total number of network round-trips issued when fetching from cursors.

    这些变量代表准备好的语句命令。它们的名称是指网络层中使用的com_xxx命令集。换句话说，每当执行准备好的语句api调用（如mysql_stmt_prepare（）、mysql_stmt_execute（）等）时，它们的值就会增加。然而，COMISTSTMTY准备，COMSTSTMTIX执行和COMSTSTMTH关闭也增加准备，执行，或释放准备。此外，用于准备、执行和重新编译语句的旧语句计数器变量的值增加了。com_stmt_fetch表示从游标提取时发出的网络往返总数。

    Com_stmt_reprepare indicates the number of times statements were automatically reprepared by the server after metadata changes to tables or views referred to by the statement. A reprepare operation increments Com_stmt_reprepare, and also Com_stmt_prepare.

    com_stmt_reprepare表示在对语句所引用的表或视图进行元数据更改后，服务器自动重新编写语句的次数。reprepare操作会增加com stmt_reprepare和com stmt_prepare。

    Com_explain_other indicates the number of EXPLAIN FOR CONNECTION statements executed. See Section 8.8.4, “Obtaining Execution Plan Information for a Named Connection”.

    com_explain_other表示执行的连接语句的解释数。参见第8.8.4节“获取命名连接的执行计划信息”。

    Com_change_repl_filter indicates the number of CHANGE REPLICATION FILTER statements executed.

    com_change_repl_filter指示执行的更改复制筛选器语句数。

  • Compression

    压缩

    Whether the client connection uses compression in the client/server protocol.

    客户机连接是否在客户机/服务器协议中使用压缩。

  • Connection_errors_xxx

    连接错误

    These variables provide information about errors that occur during the client connection process. They are global only and represent error counts aggregated across connections from all hosts. These variables track errors not accounted for by the host cache (see Section 8.12.5.2, “DNS Lookup Optimization and the Host Cache”), such as errors that are not associated with TCP connections, occur very early in the connection process (even before an IP address is known), or are not specific to any particular IP address (such as out-of-memory conditions).

    这些变量提供有关客户端连接过程中发生的错误的信息。它们仅是全局的，表示在所有主机的连接之间聚合的错误计数。这些变量跟踪主机缓存未考虑的错误（参见第8.12.5.2节“DNS查找优化和主机缓存”），例如与TCP连接无关的错误，在连接过程的早期（甚至在IP地址已知之前）发生，或不特定于任何特定IP地址（例如内存不足情况）。

    As of MySQL 5.7.3, the Connection_errors_xxx status variables are not visible in the embedded server because for that server they are not updated and are not meaningful.

    从mysql 5.7.3开始，connection_errors_xxx状态变量在嵌入式服务器中不可见，因为对于该服务器，它们没有更新并且没有意义。

    • Connection_errors_accept

      连接错误接受

      The number of errors that occurred during calls to accept() on the listening port.

      在侦听端口上调用accept（）时发生的错误数。

    • Connection_errors_internal

      内部连接错误

      The number of connections refused due to internal errors in the server, such as failure to start a new thread or an out-of-memory condition.

      由于服务器内部错误（如无法启动新线程或内存不足）而拒绝的连接数。

    • Connection_errors_max_connections

      连接错误最大连接数

      The number of connections refused because the server max_connections limit was reached.

      由于达到服务器最大连接数限制而拒绝的连接数。

    • Connection_errors_peer_address

      连接错误对等地址

      The number of errors that occurred while searching for connecting client IP addresses.

      搜索连接客户端IP地址时发生的错误数。

    • Connection_errors_select

      连接错误选择

      The number of errors that occurred during calls to select() or poll() on the listening port. (Failure of this operation does not necessarily means a client connection was rejected.)

      在侦听端口上调用select（）或poll（）时发生的错误数。（此操作失败并不一定意味着客户端连接被拒绝。）

    • Connection_errors_tcpwrap

      连接错误

      The number of connections refused by the libwrap library.

      libwrap库拒绝的连接数。

  • Connections

    连接

    The number of connection attempts (successful or not) to the MySQL server.

    尝试连接MySQL服务器的次数（成功与否）。

  • Created_tmp_disk_tables

    创建的磁盘表

    The number of internal on-disk temporary tables created by the server while executing statements.

    执行语句时服务器创建的内部磁盘上临时表的数目。

    If an internal temporary table is created initially as an in-memory table but becomes too large, MySQL automatically converts it to an on-disk table. The maximum size for in-memory temporary tables is the minimum of the tmp_table_size and max_heap_table_size values. If Created_tmp_disk_tables is large, you may want to increase the tmp_table_size or max_heap_table_size value to lessen the likelihood that internal temporary tables in memory will be converted to on-disk tables.

    如果内部临时表最初是作为内存表创建的，但变得太大，mysql会自动将其转换为磁盘表。内存临时表的最大大小是TMPYTable大小和Max HeAPPaTable大小值的最小值。如果创建的tmp_disk_tables较大，则可能需要增加tmp_table_size或max_heap_table_size值，以降低内存中的内部临时表转换为磁盘上表的可能性。

    You can compare the number of internal on-disk temporary tables created to the total number of internal temporary tables created by comparing the values of the Created_tmp_disk_tables and Created_tmp_tables variables.

    您可以将创建的内部磁盘临时表的数量与通过比较已创建的磁盘临时表和已创建的磁盘临时表变量的值而创建的内部临时表的总数进行比较。

    See also Section 8.4.4, “Internal Temporary Table Use in MySQL”.

    另请参见8.4.4节，“MySQL中的内部临时表使用”。

  • Created_tmp_files

    创建的\u tmp\u文件

    How many temporary files mysqld has created.

    mysqld创建了多少临时文件。

  • Created_tmp_tables

    创建的_tmp_表

    The number of internal temporary tables created by the server while executing statements.

    执行语句时服务器创建的内部临时表的数目。

    You can compare the number of internal on-disk temporary tables created to the total number of internal temporary tables created by comparing the values of the Created_tmp_disk_tables and Created_tmp_tables variables.

    您可以将创建的内部磁盘临时表的数量与通过比较已创建的磁盘临时表和已创建的磁盘临时表变量的值而创建的内部临时表的总数进行比较。

    See also Section 8.4.4, “Internal Temporary Table Use in MySQL”.

    另请参见8.4.4节，“MySQL中的内部临时表使用”。

    Each invocation of the SHOW STATUS statement uses an internal temporary table and increments the global Created_tmp_tables value.

    对show status语句的每次调用都使用一个内部临时表，并增加全局创建的“tmp”表值。

  • Delayed_errors

    延迟的错误

    This status variable is deprecated (because DELAYED inserts are not supported), and will be removed in a future release.

    此状态变量已弃用（因为不支持延迟插入），将在以后的版本中删除。

  • Delayed_insert_threads

    延迟的插入线程

    This status variable is deprecated (because DELAYED inserts are not supported), and will be removed in a future release.

    此状态变量已弃用（因为不支持延迟插入），将在以后的版本中删除。

  • Delayed_writes

    延迟写入

    This status variable is deprecated (because DELAYED inserts are not supported), and will be removed in a future release.

    此状态变量已弃用（因为不支持延迟插入），将在以后的版本中删除。

  • Flush_commands

    刷新命令

    The number of times the server flushes tables, whether because a user executed a FLUSH TABLES statement or due to internal server operation. It is also incremented by receipt of a COM_REFRESH packet. This is in contrast to Com_flush, which indicates how many FLUSH statements have been executed, whether FLUSH TABLES, FLUSH LOGS, and so forth.

    服务器刷新表的次数，无论是因为用户执行了flush tables语句还是由于内部服务器操作。它还通过接收COM刷新数据包而递增。这与com_flush相反，com_flush指示执行了多少flush语句，是否刷新表、刷新日志等等。

  • group_replication_primary_member

    组复制主要成员

    Shows the primary member's UUID when the group is operating in single-primary mode. If the group is operating in multi-primary mode, shows an empty string.

    当组在单一主模式下操作时，显示主成员的uuid。如果组在多主模式下操作，则显示空字符串。

  • Handler_commit

    处理程序提交

    The number of internal COMMIT statements.

    内部提交语句的数目。

  • Handler_delete

    处理程序删除

    The number of times that rows have been deleted from tables.

    从表中删除行的次数。

  • Handler_external_lock

    处理程序外部锁

    The server increments this variable for each call to its external_lock() function, which generally occurs at the beginning and end of access to a table instance. There might be differences among storage engines. This variable can be used, for example, to discover for a statement that accesses a partitioned table how many partitions were pruned before locking occurred: Check how much the counter increased for the statement, subtract 2 (2 calls for the table itself), then divide by 2 to get the number of partitions locked.

    服务器每次调用其外部的_lock（）函数时都会增加这个变量，通常在访问表实例的开始和结束时发生。存储引擎之间可能存在差异。例如，可以使用此变量来发现访问分区表的语句在发生锁定之前修剪了多少分区：检查该语句的计数器增加了多少，减去2（对表本身的2次调用），然后除以2得到锁定的分区数。

  • Handler_mrr_init

    处理程序初始化

    The number of times the server uses a storage engine's own Multi-Range Read implementation for table access.

    服务器使用存储引擎自己的多范围读取实现进行表访问的次数。

  • Handler_prepare

    经办人准备

    A counter for the prepare phase of two-phase commit operations.

    两阶段提交操作的准备阶段的计数器。

  • Handler_read_first

    处理程序先读取

    The number of times the first entry in an index was read. If this value is high, it suggests that the server is doing a lot of full index scans (for example, SELECT col1 FROM foo, assuming that col1 is indexed).

    读取索引中第一个项的次数。如果该值很高，则表明服务器正在执行大量的完全索引扫描（例如，假设col1已被索引，则从foo中选择col1）。

  • Handler_read_key

    处理程序读取密钥

    The number of requests to read a row based on a key. If this value is high, it is a good indication that your tables are properly indexed for your queries.

    基于键读取行的请求数。如果此值很高，则很好地表明您的表已为查询正确编制了索引。

  • Handler_read_last

    处理程序最后读取

    The number of requests to read the last key in an index. With ORDER BY, the server will issue a first-key request followed by several next-key requests, whereas with ORDER BY DESC, the server will issue a last-key request followed by several previous-key requests.

    读取索引中最后一个键的请求数。使用order by，服务器将发出第一个密钥请求，然后是几个下一个密钥请求；而使用order by desc，服务器将发出最后一个密钥请求，然后是几个以前的密钥请求。

  • Handler_read_next

    处理程序读取下一个

    The number of requests to read the next row in key order. This value is incremented if you are querying an index column with a range constraint or if you are doing an index scan.

    按键顺序读取下一行的请求数。如果查询具有范围约束的索引列或执行索引扫描，则此值将递增。

  • Handler_read_prev

    处理程序读取前一个

    The number of requests to read the previous row in key order. This read method is mainly used to optimize ORDER BY ... DESC.

    按键顺序读取前一行的请求数。这种读取方法主要用于通过…说明

  • Handler_read_rnd

    处理程序读取

    The number of requests to read a row based on a fixed position. This value is high if you are doing a lot of queries that require sorting of the result. You probably have a lot of queries that require MySQL to scan entire tables or you have joins that do not use keys properly.

    基于固定位置读取行的请求数。如果您正在执行大量需要对结果进行排序的查询，则此值很高。您可能有很多查询需要mysql扫描整个表，或者有一些连接没有正确使用键。

  • Handler_read_rnd_next

    处理程序读取下一个

    The number of requests to read the next row in the data file. This value is high if you are doing a lot of table scans. Generally this suggests that your tables are not properly indexed or that your queries are not written to take advantage of the indexes you have.

    读取数据文件中下一行的请求数。如果执行大量表扫描，则此值很高。一般来说，这表明您的表没有正确编制索引，或者您的查询不是为了利用您的索引而编写的。

  • Handler_rollback

    处理程序回滚

    The number of requests for a storage engine to perform a rollback operation.

    对存储引擎执行回滚操作的请求数。

  • Handler_savepoint

    处理程序保存点

    The number of requests for a storage engine to place a savepoint.

    存储引擎放置保存点的请求数。

  • Handler_savepoint_rollback

    处理程序保存点回滚

    The number of requests for a storage engine to roll back to a savepoint.

    存储引擎回滚到保存点的请求数。

  • Handler_update

    处理程序更新

    The number of requests to update a row in a table.

    更新表中行的请求数。

  • Handler_write

    处理程序写入

    The number of requests to insert a row in a table.

    在表中插入行的请求数。

  • Innodb_available_undo_logs

    innodb_available_undo_日志

    Note

    The Innodb_available_undo_logs status variable is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.19 and will be removed in a future release.

    innodb_available_undo_logs status变量从mysql 5.7.19开始就被弃用，并将在以后的版本中删除。

    The total number of available InnoDB rollback segments. Supplements the innodb_rollback_segments system variable, which defines the number of active rollback segments.

    可用innodb回滚段的总数。补充innodb_rollback_segments系统变量，该变量定义活动回滚段的数量。

    One rollback segment always resides in the system tablespace, and 32 rollback segments are reserved for use by temporary tables and are hosted in the temporary tablespace (ibtmp1). See Section 14.6.7, “Undo Logs”.

    一个回滚段始终驻留在系统表空间中，32个回滚段保留给临时表使用，并托管在临时表空间（ibtmp1）中。见第14.6.7节“撤销日志”。

    If you initiate a MySQL instance with 32 or fewer rollback segments, InnoDB still assigns one rollback segment to the system tablespace and 32 rollback segments to the temporary tablespace. In this case, Innodb_available_undo_logs reports 33 available rollback segments even though the instance was initialized with a lesser innodb_rollback_segments value.

    如果启动一个回滚段不超过32个的mysql实例，innodb仍然会给系统表空间分配一个回滚段，给临时表空间分配32个回滚段。在这种情况下，innodb_available_undo_日志报告33个可用的回滚段，即使实例是用较小的innodb_rollback_segments值初始化的。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_dump_status

    innodb_buffer_pool_dump_状态

    The progress of an operation to record the pages held in the InnoDB buffer pool, triggered by the setting of innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown or innodb_buffer_pool_dump_now.

    记录InnoDB缓冲池中保存的页的操作的进度，由InnoDB缓冲池转储设置在关机或InnoDB缓冲池转储设置触发。

    For related information and examples, see Section 14.8.3.6, “Saving and Restoring the Buffer Pool State”.

    有关信息和示例，请参阅第14.8.3.6节“保存和还原缓冲池状态”。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_load_status

    innodb_buffer_pool_load_状态

    The progress of an operation to warm up the InnoDB buffer pool by reading in a set of pages corresponding to an earlier point in time, triggered by the setting of innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup or innodb_buffer_pool_load_now. If the operation introduces too much overhead, you can cancel it by setting innodb_buffer_pool_load_abort.

    通过读取与较早时间点相对应的一组页来预热InnoDB缓冲池的操作过程，该过程由InnoDB缓冲池在启动时设置为加载或InnoDB缓冲池立即设置为加载触发。如果这个操作带来了太多的开销，可以通过设置innodb_buffer_pool_load_abort来取消它。

    For related information and examples, see Section 14.8.3.6, “Saving and Restoring the Buffer Pool State”.

    有关信息和示例，请参阅第14.8.3.6节“保存和还原缓冲池状态”。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_data

    innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_数据

    The total number of bytes in the InnoDB buffer pool containing data. The number includes both dirty and clean pages. For more accurate memory usage calculations than with Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data, when compressed tables cause the buffer pool to hold pages of different sizes.

    InnoDB缓冲池中包含数据的字节总数。这个数字包括脏页和干净页。为了比innodb_buffer_pool_pages_数据更精确地计算内存使用量，当压缩表导致缓冲池容纳不同大小的页面时。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_数据

    The number of pages in the InnoDB buffer pool containing data. The number includes both dirty and clean pages. When using compressed tables, the reported Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data value may be larger than Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total (Bug #59550).

    innodb缓冲池中包含数据的页数。这个数字包括脏页和干净页。使用压缩表时，报告的innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data值可能大于innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total（错误59550）。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty

    innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_脏

    The total current number of bytes held in dirty pages in the InnoDB buffer pool. For more accurate memory usage calculations than with Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty, when compressed tables cause the buffer pool to hold pages of different sizes.

    InnoDB缓冲池中脏页中当前保存的字节总数。为了比innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty更精确的内存使用计算，当压缩表导致缓冲池容纳不同大小的页面时。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_脏

    The current number of dirty pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

    InnoDB缓冲池中当前脏页数。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_flushed

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_刷新

    The number of requests to flush pages from the InnoDB buffer pool.

    从InnoDB缓冲池刷新页面的请求数。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_空闲

    The number of free pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

    InnoDB缓冲池中的可用页数。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_latched

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_锁定

    The number of latched pages in the InnoDB buffer pool. These are pages currently being read or written, or that cannot be flushed or removed for some other reason. Calculation of this variable is expensive, so it is available only when the UNIV_DEBUG system is defined at server build time.

    InnoDB缓冲池中的锁存页数。这些是当前正在读取或写入的页，或者由于其他原因无法刷新或删除的页。此变量的计算非常昂贵，因此只有在服务器生成时定义univ_调试系统时才可用。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc

    innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc公司

    The number of pages in the InnoDB buffer pool that are busy because they have been allocated for administrative overhead, such as row locks or the adaptive hash index. This value can also be calculated as Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total − Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free − Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data. When using compressed tables, Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc may report an out-of-bounds value (Bug #59550).

    InnoDB缓冲池中由于分配了管理开销（如行锁或自适应哈希索引）而处于忙碌状态的页面数。此值也可以计算为innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total–-innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free–-innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data。使用压缩表时，innodb_buffer_pool_pages_misc可能会报告一个越界值（错误59550）。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total

    InnoDB_Buffer_Pool_Pages_总计

    The total size of the InnoDB buffer pool, in pages. When using compressed tables, the reported Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data value may be larger than Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total (Bug #59550)

    InnoDB缓冲池的总大小，以页为单位。使用压缩表时，报告的innodb_buffer_pool_pages_data值可能大于innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total（错误59550）

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead

    innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_前面的缓冲池

    The number of pages read into the InnoDB buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread.

    由预读后台线程读入innodb缓冲池的页数。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_evicted

    innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_逐出

    The number of pages read into the InnoDB buffer pool by the read-ahead background thread that were subsequently evicted without having been accessed by queries.

    由预读后台线程读入innodb缓冲池的页数，这些页随后被逐出而未被查询访问。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_rnd

    innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_rnd的缓冲池

    The number of “random” read-aheads initiated by InnoDB. This happens when a query scans a large portion of a table but in random order.

    由InnoDB启动的“随机”读取头数。当查询以随机顺序扫描表的很大一部分时，就会发生这种情况。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests

    innodb_buffer_pool_read_请求

    The number of logical read requests.

    逻辑读取请求数。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_reads

    innodb_buffer_pool_读取

    The number of logical reads that InnoDB could not satisfy from the buffer pool, and had to read directly from disk.

    innodb无法从缓冲池中满足的逻辑读取数，必须直接从磁盘读取。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_resize_status

    innodb_buffer_pool_resize_状态

    The status of an operation to resize the InnoDB buffer pool dynamically, triggered by setting the innodb_buffer_pool_size parameter dynamically. The innodb_buffer_pool_size parameter is dynamic, which allows you to resize the buffer pool without restarting the server. See Configuring InnoDB Buffer Pool Size Online for related information.

    动态调整innodb缓冲池大小的操作状态，由动态设置innodb缓冲池大小参数触发。innodb_buffer_pool_size参数是动态的，它允许您在不重新启动服务器的情况下调整缓冲池的大小。有关信息，请参阅联机配置innodb缓冲池大小。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free

    innodb_buffer_pool_wait_空闲

    Normally, writes to the InnoDB buffer pool happen in the background. When InnoDB needs to read or create a page and no clean pages are available, InnoDB flushes some dirty pages first and waits for that operation to finish. This counter counts instances of these waits. If innodb_buffer_pool_size has been set properly, this value should be small.

    通常，对innodb缓冲池的写入是在后台进行的。当innodb需要读取或创建一个页面而没有可用的干净页面时，innodb会先刷新一些脏页面，然后等待该操作完成。此计数器统计这些等待的实例。如果innodb_buffer_pool_size设置正确，那么这个值应该很小。

  • Innodb_buffer_pool_write_requests

    innodb_buffer_pool_write_请求

    The number of writes done to the InnoDB buffer pool.

    对innodb缓冲池的写入次数。

  • Innodb_data_fsyncs

    InnoDB_数据同步

    The number of fsync() operations so far. The frequency of fsync() calls is influenced by the setting of the innodb_flush_method configuration option.

    到目前为止fsync（）操作的数目。fsync（）调用的频率受innodb_flush_方法配置选项的设置影响。

  • Innodb_data_pending_fsyncs

    innodb_data_挂起的同步

    The current number of pending fsync() operations. The frequency of fsync() calls is influenced by the setting of the innodb_flush_method configuration option.

    当前挂起的fsync（）操作数。fsync（）调用的频率受innodb_flush_方法配置选项的设置影响。

  • Innodb_data_pending_reads

    innodb_data_pending_读取

    The current number of pending reads.

    当前挂起的读取数。

  • Innodb_data_pending_writes

    innodb_data_pending_写入

    The current number of pending writes.

    当前挂起的写入数。

  • Innodb_data_read

    InnoDB_数据读取

    The amount of data read since the server was started (in bytes).

    自服务器启动以来读取的数据量（字节）。

  • Innodb_data_reads

    InnoDB_数据读取

    The total number of data reads (OS file reads).

    数据读取（OS文件读取）的总数。

  • Innodb_data_writes

    innodb_data_写入

    The total number of data writes.

    数据写入的总数。

  • Innodb_data_written

    InnoDB_数据写入

    The amount of data written so far, in bytes.

    迄今为止以字节为单位写入的数据量。

  • Innodb_dblwr_pages_written

    innodb_dblwr_pages_书面

    The number of pages that have been written to the doublewrite buffer. See Section 14.12.1, “InnoDB Disk I/O”.

    已写入DoubleWrite缓冲区的页数。参见第14.12.1节“InnoDB磁盘I/O”。

  • Innodb_dblwr_writes

    innodb_dblwr_写入

    The number of doublewrite operations that have been performed. See Section 14.12.1, “InnoDB Disk I/O”.

    已执行的DoubleWrite操作数。参见第14.12.1节“InnoDB磁盘I/O”。

  • Innodb_have_atomic_builtins

    InnoDB有原子内置设备

    Indicates whether the server was built with atomic instructions.

    指示服务器是否使用原子指令生成。

  • Innodb_log_waits

    InnoDB_Log_等待

    The number of times that the log buffer was too small and a wait was required for it to be flushed before continuing.

    日志缓冲区太小且需要等待刷新才能继续的次数。

  • Innodb_log_write_requests

    innodb_log_write_请求

    The number of write requests for the InnoDB redo log.

    InnoDB重做日志的写入请求数。

  • Innodb_log_writes

    InnoDB_日志写入

    The number of physical writes to the InnoDB redo log file.

    对innodb重做日志文件的物理写入次数。

  • Innodb_num_open_files

    innodb_num_open_文件

    The number of files InnoDB currently holds open.

    InnoDB当前打开的文件数。

  • Innodb_os_log_fsyncs

    InnoDB操作系统日志同步

    The number of fsync() writes done to the InnoDB redo log files.

    对innodb重做日志文件的fsync（）写入次数。

  • Innodb_os_log_pending_fsyncs

    InnoDB_OS_Log_挂起的同步

    The number of pending fsync() operations for the InnoDB redo log files.

    InnoDB重做日志文件的挂起fsync（）操作数。

  • Innodb_os_log_pending_writes

    InnoDB_OS_Log_Pending_写入

    The number of pending writes to the InnoDB redo log files.

    InnoDB重做日志文件的挂起写入数。

  • Innodb_os_log_written

    InnoDB_OS_日志

    The number of bytes written to the InnoDB redo log files.

    写入InnoDB重做日志文件的字节数。

  • Innodb_page_size

    innodb_页面大小

    InnoDB page size (default 16KB). Many values are counted in pages; the page size enables them to be easily converted to bytes.

    InnoDB页面大小（默认为16KB）。许多值在页面中计算；页面大小使它们能够轻松地转换为字节。

  • Innodb_pages_created

    InnoDB_pages_已创建

    The number of pages created by operations on InnoDB tables.

    innodb表上的操作创建的页数。

  • Innodb_pages_read

    InnoDB_页面读取

    The number of pages read from the InnoDB buffer pool by operations on InnoDB tables.

    通过对innodb表的操作从innodb缓冲池读取的页数。

  • Innodb_pages_written

    innodb_pages_书面

    The number of pages written by operations on InnoDB tables.

    innodb表上操作写入的页数。

  • Innodb_row_lock_current_waits

    innodb_row_lock_current_等待

    The number of row locks currently being waited for by operations on InnoDB tables.

    InnoDB表上操作当前等待的行锁数。

  • Innodb_row_lock_time

    innodb_row_lock_时间

    The total time spent in acquiring row locks for InnoDB tables, in milliseconds.

    获取innodb表的行锁所用的总时间（毫秒）。

  • Innodb_row_lock_time_avg

    innodb_row_lock_time_平均

    The average time to acquire a row lock for InnoDB tables, in milliseconds.

    获取innodb表的行锁的平均时间（毫秒）。

  • Innodb_row_lock_time_max

    InnoDB_Row_Lock_Time_最大

    The maximum time to acquire a row lock for InnoDB tables, in milliseconds.

    以毫秒为单位获取NYNDB表行锁的最大时间。

  • Innodb_row_lock_waits

    innodb_row_lock_等待

    The number of times operations on InnoDB tables had to wait for a row lock.

    InnoDB表上的操作必须等待行锁的次数。

  • Innodb_rows_deleted

    InnoDB_行已删除

    The number of rows deleted from InnoDB tables.

    从innodb表中删除的行数。

  • Innodb_rows_inserted

    innodb_rows_插入

    The number of rows inserted into InnoDB tables.

    插入innodb表的行数。

  • Innodb_rows_read

    InnoDB_行读取

    The number of rows read from InnoDB tables.

    从innodb表中读取的行数。

  • Innodb_rows_updated

    InnoDB_rows_已更新

    The number of rows updated in InnoDB tables.

    InnoDB表中更新的行数。

  • Innodb_truncated_status_writes

    innodb_truncated_status_写入

    The number of times output from the SHOW ENGINE INNODB STATUS statement has been truncated.

    show engine innodb status语句输出被截断的次数。

  • Key_blocks_not_flushed

    键块未刷新

    The number of key blocks in the MyISAM key cache that have changed but have not yet been flushed to disk.

    MyISAM密钥缓存中已更改但尚未刷新到磁盘的密钥块数。

  • Key_blocks_unused

    未使用的密钥块

    The number of unused blocks in the MyISAM key cache. You can use this value to determine how much of the key cache is in use; see the discussion of key_buffer_size in Section 5.1.7, “Server System Variables”.

    MyISAM密钥缓存中未使用的块数。您可以使用此值来确定正在使用的密钥缓存的数量；请参阅第5.1.7节“服务器系统变量”中有关密钥缓冲区大小的讨论。

  • Key_blocks_used

    使用的关键块

    The number of used blocks in the MyISAM key cache. This value is a high-water mark that indicates the maximum number of blocks that have ever been in use at one time.

    MyISAM密钥缓存中使用的块数。这个值是一个高水标，指示曾经使用过的块的最大数量。

  • Key_read_requests

    密钥读取请求

    The number of requests to read a key block from the MyISAM key cache.

    从MyISAM密钥缓存读取密钥块的请求数。

  • Key_reads

    密钥读取

    The number of physical reads of a key block from disk into the MyISAM key cache. If Key_reads is large, then your key_buffer_size value is probably too small. The cache miss rate can be calculated as Key_reads/Key_read_requests.

    从磁盘向MyISAM密钥缓存中物理读取密钥块的次数。如果key_reads很大，那么key_buffer_size值可能太小。缓存未命中率可以计算为密钥读取/密钥读取请求。

  • Key_write_requests

    密钥写入请求

    The number of requests to write a key block to the MyISAM key cache.

    向MyISAM密钥缓存写入密钥块的请求数。

  • Key_writes

    密钥写入

    The number of physical writes of a key block from the MyISAM key cache to disk.

    从MyISAM密钥缓存向磁盘物理写入密钥块的次数。

  • Last_query_cost

    上次查询成本

    The total cost of the last compiled query as computed by the query optimizer. This is useful for comparing the cost of different query plans for the same query. The default value of 0 means that no query has been compiled yet. The default value is 0. Last_query_cost has session scope.

    查询优化器计算的上次编译查询的总成本。这对于比较同一查询的不同查询计划的成本非常有用。默认值0表示尚未编译任何查询。默认值为0。上次查询成本具有会话范围。

    Last_query_cost can be computed accurately only for simple, “flat” queries, but not for complex queries such as those containing subqueries or UNION. For the latter, the value is set to 0.

    只有简单的“平面”查询才能精确地计算最后的查询成本，但对于复杂的查询（如包含子查询或并集的查询）则不能精确地计算最后的查询成本。对于后者，该值设置为0。

  • Last_query_partial_plans

    上次查询部分计划

    The number of iterations the query optimizer made in execution plan construction for the previous query. Last_query_cost has session scope.

    查询优化器在上一个查询的执行计划构造中进行的迭代次数。上次查询成本具有会话范围。

  • Locked_connects

    锁定的连接

    The number of attempts to connect to locked user accounts. For information about account locking and unlocking, see Section 6.2.15, “Account Locking”.

    尝试连接到锁定用户帐户的次数。有关帐户锁定和解锁的信息，请参阅第6.2.15节“帐户锁定”。

  • Max_execution_time_exceeded

    超过最大执行时间

    The number of SELECT statements for which the execution timeout was exceeded.

    超出执行超时的select语句数。

  • Max_execution_time_set

    最大执行时间设置

    The number of SELECT statements for which a nonzero execution timeout was set. This includes statements that include a nonzero MAX_EXECUTION_TIME optimizer hint, and statements that include no such hint but execute while the timeout indicated by the max_execution_time system variable is nonzero.

    为其设置了非零执行超时的select语句数。这包括包含非零max_execution_time优化器提示的语句，以及不包含此类提示但在max_execution_time系统变量指示的超时为非零时执行的语句。

  • Max_execution_time_set_failed

    最大执行时间设置失败

    The number of SELECT statements for which the attempt to set an execution timeout failed.

    尝试设置执行超时失败的select语句数。

  • Max_statement_time_exceeded

    超过最大声明时间

    This variable was renamed to Max_execution_time_exceeded in MySQL 5.7.8.

    在mysql 5.7.8中，此变量被重命名为max_execution_exceeded。

  • Max_statement_time_set

    最大声明时间集

    This variable was renamed to Max_execution_time_set in MySQL 5.7.8.

    这个变量在mysql 5.7.8中被重命名为max_execution_time_set。

  • Max_statement_time_set_failed

    max_statement_time_set_失败

    This variable was renamed to Max_execution_time_set_failed in MySQL 5.7.8.

    在mysql 5.7.8中，此变量被重命名为max_execution_time_set_failed。

  • Max_used_connections

    最大已用连接数

    The maximum number of connections that have been in use simultaneously since the server started.

    自服务器启动以来同时使用的最大连接数。

  • Max_used_connections_time

    最大使用连接时间

    The time at which Max_used_connections reached its current value.

    max_used_connections达到其当前值的时间。

  • Not_flushed_delayed_rows

    未刷新已延迟的行

    This status variable is deprecated (because DELAYED inserts are not supported), and will be removed in a future release.

    此状态变量已弃用（因为不支持延迟插入），将在以后的版本中删除。

  • mecab_charset

    麦卡布沙司

    The character set currently used by the MeCab full-text parser plugin. For related information, see Section 12.9.9, “MeCab Full-Text Parser Plugin”.

    mecab全文分析器插件当前使用的字符集。有关信息，请参阅12.9.9节，“mecab全文解析器插件”。

  • Ongoing_anonymous_transaction_count

    正在进行的匿名交易计数

    Shows the number of ongoing transactions which have been marked as anonymous. This can be used to ensure that no further transactions are waiting to be processed.

    显示标记为匿名的正在进行的事务数。这可用于确保不再有其他事务等待处理。

  • Ongoing_anonymous_gtid_violating_transaction_count

    正在进行的匿名违反交易计数

    This status variable is only available in debug builds. Shows the number of ongoing transactions which use gtid_next=ANONYMOUS and that violate GTID consistency.

    此状态变量仅在调试生成中可用。显示使用gtid_next=anonymous且违反gtid一致性的正在进行的事务数。

  • Ongoing_automatic_gtid_violating_transaction_count

    正在进行的自动违反交易计数

    This status variable is only available in debug builds. Shows the number of ongoing transactions which use gtid_next=AUTOMATIC and that violate GTID consistency.

    此状态变量仅在调试生成中可用。显示使用gtid_next=automatic且违反gtid一致性的正在进行的事务数。

  • Open_files

    打开文件

    The number of files that are open. This count includes regular files opened by the server. It does not include other types of files such as sockets or pipes. Also, the count does not include files that storage engines open using their own internal functions rather than asking the server level to do so.

    打开的文件数。此计数包括服务器打开的常规文件。它不包括其他类型的文件，如套接字或管道。此外，计数不包括存储引擎使用自己的内部功能打开的文件，而不是要求服务器级别这样做。

  • Open_streams

    明渠

    The number of streams that are open (used mainly for logging).

    打开的流数（主要用于日志记录）。

  • Open_table_definitions

    打开表定义

    The number of cached .frm files.

    缓存的.frm文件数。

  • Open_tables

    打开桌子

    The number of tables that are open.

    打开的表数。

  • Opened_files

    打开的文件

    The number of files that have been opened with my_open() (a mysys library function). Parts of the server that open files without using this function do not increment the count.

    使用My_Open（）打开的文件数（Mysys库函数）。未使用此函数打开文件的服务器部分不会增加计数。

  • Opened_table_definitions

    打开的表定义

    The number of .frm files that have been cached.

    已缓存的.frm文件数。

  • Opened_tables

    打开的表

    The number of tables that have been opened. If Opened_tables is big, your table_open_cache value is probably too small.

    已打开的表数。如果open_tables很大，那么table_open_cache值可能太小。

  • Performance_schema_xxx

    性能方案

    Performance Schema status variables are listed in Section 25.16, “Performance Schema Status Variables”. These variables provide information about instrumentation that could not be loaded or created due to memory constraints.

    性能模式状态变量列在25.16节“性能模式状态变量”中。这些变量提供有关由于内存限制而无法加载或创建的检测的信息。

  • Prepared_stmt_count

    准备工作计数

    The current number of prepared statements. (The maximum number of statements is given by the max_prepared_stmt_count system variable.)

    当前准备的语句数。（语句的最大数目由Max PrPaReDysSTMTyCalt系统变量给出）。

  • Qcache_free_blocks

    qcache_free_块

    The number of free memory blocks in the query cache.

    查询缓存中的可用内存块数。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_free_blocks.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。弃用包括qcache_free_块。

  • Qcache_free_memory

    qcache_空闲内存

    The amount of free memory for the query cache.

    查询缓存的可用内存量。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_free_memory.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。弃用包括qcache_free_内存。

  • Qcache_hits

    qcache\u点击

    The number of query cache hits.

    查询缓存命中数。

    The discussion at the beginning of this section indicates how to relate this statement-counting status variable to other such variables.

    本节开头的讨论说明了如何将此语句计数状态变量与其他此类变量相关联。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_hits.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。不推荐包括qcache\u命中。

  • Qcache_inserts

    qcache_插入

    The number of queries added to the query cache.

    添加到查询缓存的查询数。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_inserts.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。不推荐包括qcache_插入。

  • Qcache_lowmem_prunes

    李子

    The number of queries that were deleted from the query cache because of low memory.

    由于内存不足而从查询缓存中删除的查询数。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_lowmem_prunes.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。反对包括qcache_lowmem_prunes。

  • Qcache_not_cached

    qcache没有缓存

    The number of noncached queries (not cacheable, or not cached due to the query_cache_type setting).

    未缓存的查询数（不可缓存，或由于查询缓存类型设置而未缓存）。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_not_cached.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。不推荐包括qcache_not_cached。

  • Qcache_queries_in_cache

    qcache_在缓存中查询

    The number of queries registered in the query cache.

    在查询缓存中注册的查询数。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_queries_in_cache.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。不推荐包括缓存中的qcache查询。

  • Qcache_total_blocks

    qcache_total_块

    The total number of blocks in the query cache.

    查询缓存中块的总数。

    Note

    The query cache is deprecated as of MySQL 5.7.20, and is removed in MySQL 8.0. Deprecation includes Qcache_total_blocks.

    从mysql 5.7.20开始，查询缓存已被弃用，并在mysql 8.0中被删除。折旧包括qcache_total_块。

  • Queries

    查询

    The number of statements executed by the server. This variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Questions variable. It does not count COM_PING or COM_STATISTICS commands.

    服务器执行的语句数。与questions变量不同，此变量包含在存储程序中执行的语句。它不计算com_ping或com_statistics命令。

    The discussion at the beginning of this section indicates how to relate this statement-counting status variable to other such variables.

    本节开头的讨论说明了如何将此语句计数状态变量与其他此类变量相关联。

  • Questions

    问题

    The number of statements executed by the server. This includes only statements sent to the server by clients and not statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Queries variable. This variable does not count COM_PING, COM_STATISTICS, COM_STMT_PREPARE, COM_STMT_CLOSE, or COM_STMT_RESET commands.

    服务器执行的语句数。这只包括客户端发送到服务器的语句，而不包括存储程序中执行的语句，这与查询变量不同。此变量不计算COMIPSIN、COMSOLISTATION、COMIXSTMTUSER、COMIOSTSTMIORD或COMISTMTMUSER命令。

    The discussion at the beginning of this section indicates how to relate this statement-counting status variable to other such variables.

    本节开头的讨论说明了如何将此语句计数状态变量与其他此类变量相关联。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_clients

    rpl_semi_sync_master_客户端

    The number of semisynchronous slaves.

    半同步从机的数量。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_avg_wait_time

    半同步主机平均等待时间

    The average time in microseconds the master waited for a slave reply. This variable is deprecated, always 0, and will be removed in a future version.

    主服务器等待从服务器应答的平均时间（微秒）。此变量已弃用，始终为0，并将在以后的版本中删除。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_wait_time

    半同步主机等待时间

    The total time in microseconds the master waited for slave replies. This variable is deprecated, always 0, and will be removed in a future version.

    主服务器等待从服务器响应的总时间（微秒）。此变量已弃用，始终为0，并将在以后的版本中删除。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_waits

    半同步主机等待

    The total number of times the master waited for slave replies.

    主服务器等待从服务器响应的总次数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_times

    RPL_Semi_Sync_Master_No_时间

    The number of times the master turned off semisynchronous replication.

    主服务器关闭半同步复制的次数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_tx

    半同步主机

    The number of commits that were not acknowledged successfully by a slave.

    从属服务器未成功确认的提交数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_status

    半同步主机状态

    Whether semisynchronous replication currently is operational on the master. The value is ON if the plugin has been enabled and a commit acknowledgment has occurred. It is OFF if the plugin is not enabled or the master has fallen back to asynchronous replication due to commit acknowledgment timeout.

    半同步复制当前是否在主服务器上运行。如果插件已启用并且发生了提交确认，则该值为开。如果插件未启用，或者由于提交确认超时，主服务器已返回到异步复制，则该选项处于关闭状态。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_timefunc_failures

    rpl_semi_sync_master_timefunc_失败

    The number of times the master failed when calling time functions such as gettimeofday().

    调用时间函数（如getTimeOfDay（））时主控程序失败的次数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_avg_wait_time

    半同步主机平均等待时间

    The average time in microseconds the master waited for each transaction.

    主服务器等待每个事务的平均时间（微秒）。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_time

    rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_时间

    The total time in microseconds the master waited for transactions.

    主服务器等待事务的总时间（微秒）。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_waits

    半同步主机等待

    The total number of times the master waited for transactions.

    主服务器等待事务的总次数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_pos_backtraverse

    rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_pos_backtraverse半同步主机

    The total number of times the master waited for an event with binary coordinates lower than events waited for previously. This can occur when the order in which transactions start waiting for a reply is different from the order in which their binary log events are written.

    主节点等待二进制坐标低于以前等待的事件的总次数。当事务开始等待应答的顺序与写入二进制日志事件的顺序不同时，可能会发生这种情况。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_sessions

    rpl_semi_sync_master_wait_会话

    The number of sessions currently waiting for slave replies.

    当前等待从机答复的会话数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_master_yes_tx

    半同步主机

    The number of commits that were acknowledged successfully by a slave.

    从属服务器成功确认的提交数。

    This variable is available only if the master-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    仅当安装了主端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rpl_semi_sync_slave_status

    半同步从机状态

    Whether semisynchronous replication currently is operational on the slave. This is ON if the plugin has been enabled and the slave I/O thread is running, OFF otherwise.

    半同步复制当前是否在从机上运行。如果插件已启用且从属I/O线程正在运行，则此选项为开，否则为关。

    This variable is available only if the slave-side semisynchronous replication plugin is installed.

    只有在安装了从端半同步复制插件时，此变量才可用。

  • Rsa_public_key

    RSA_公钥
